Name: CVE-2014-8884
Description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the ttusbdecfe_dvbs_diseqc_send_master_cmd function in drivers/media/usb/ttusb-dec/ttusbdecfe.c in the Linux kernel before 3.17.4 allows local users to cause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly gain privileges via a large message length in an ioctl call.

Name: CVE-2014-8886
Description: AVM FRITZ!OS before 6.30 extracts the contents of firmware updates before verifying their cryptographic signature, which allows remote attackers to create symlinks or overwrite critical files, and consequently execute arbitrary code, via a crafted firmware image.
References: BUGTRAQ:20160107 [RT-SA-2014-014] AVM FRITZ!Box: Arbitrary Code Execution Through Manipulated Firmware Images   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/537246/100/0/threaded   |   CONFIRM:https://avm.de/service/sicherheitsinfos-zu-updates/   |   FULLDISC:20160107 [RT-SA-2014-014] AVM FRITZ!Box: Arbitrary Code Execution Through Manipulated Firmware Images   |   URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2016/Jan/12   |   MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/135161/AVM-FRITZ-Box-Arbitrary-Code-Execution-Via-Firmware-Images.html   |   MISC:https://www.redteam-pentesting.de/advisories/rt-sa-2014-014

Name: CVE-2014-8887
Description: IBM Marketing Operations 7.x and 8.x before 8.5.0.7.2, 8.6.x before 8.6.0.8, 9.0.x before 9.0.0.4.1, 9.1.0.x before 9.1.0.5, and 9.1.1.x before 9.1.1.2 allows remote authenticated users to upload arbitrary GIFAR files, and consequently modify data, via unspecified vectors.

Name: CVE-2014-8888
Description: The remote administration interface in D-Link DIR-815 devices with firmware before 2.03.B02 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via vectors related to an "HTTP command injection issue."

Name: CVE-2014-8889
Description: Dropbox SDK for Android before 1.6.2 might allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via crafted malware or via a drive-by download attack.
References: BID:73035   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/73035   |   BUGTRAQ:20150311 Vulnerability in the Dropbox SDK for Android (CVE-2014-8889)   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/534843/100/1500/threaded   |   FULLDISC:20150311 Vulnerability in the Dropbox SDK for Android (CVE-2014-8889)   |   URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2015/Mar/61   |   MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/130767/Dropbox-SDK-For-Android-Remote-Exploitation.html   |   MISC:https://securityintelligence.com/droppedin-remotely-exploitable-vulnerability-in-the-dropbox-sdk-for-android/

Name: CVE-2014-8890
Description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty Profile 8.5.x before 8.5.5.4 allows remote attackers to gain privileges by leveraging the combination of a servlet's deployment descriptor security constraints and ServletSecurity annotations.

Name: CVE-2014-8891
Description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Java Virtual Machine (JVM) in IBM SDK, Java Technology Edition 5.0 before SR16-FP9, 6 before SR16-FP3, 6R1 before SR8-FP3, 7 before SR8-FP10, and 7R1 before SR2-FP10 allows remote attackers to escape the Java sandbox and execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors related to the security manager.

Description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Java Virtual Machine (JVM) in IBM SDK, Java Technology Edition 5.0 before SR16-FP9, 6 before SR16-FP3, 6R1 before SR8-FP3, 7 before SR8-FP10, and 7R1 before SR2-FP10 allows remote attackers to bypass intended access permissions and obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors related to the security manager.

Name: CVE-2014-8893
Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in (1) mainpage.jsp and (2) GetImageServlet.img in IBM TRIRIGA Application Platform 3.2.1.x, 3.3.2 before 3.3.2.3, and 3.4.1 before 3.4.1.1 allow remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted URL.

Name: CVE-2014-8894
Description: Open redirect vulnerability in IBM TRIRIGA Application Platform 3.2.1.x, 3.3.2 before 3.3.2.3, and 3.4.1 before 3.4.1.1 allows remote authenticated users to redirect users to arbitrary web sites and conduct phishing attacks via the out parameter.

Name: CVE-2014-8895
Description: IBM TRIRIGA Application Platform 3.2.1.x, 3.3.2 before 3.3.2.3, and 3.4.1 before 3.4.1.1 allows remote attackers to bypass intended access restrictions and read the image files of arbitrary users via a crafted URL.

Name: CVE-2014-8896
Description: The Collaboration Server in IBM InfoSphere Master Data Management Server for Product Information Management 9.x through 9.1 and InfoSphere Master Data Management - Collaborative Edition 10.x through 10.1, 11.0 before FP7, and 11.3 and 11.4 before 11.4 FP1 allows remote authenticated users to modify the administrator's credentials and consequently gain privileges via unspecified vectors.

Name: CVE-2014-8897
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Collaboration Server in IBM InfoSphere Master Data Management Server for Product Information Management 9.x through 9.1 and InfoSphere Master Data Management - Collaborative Edition 10.x through 10.1, 11.0 before FP7, and 11.3 and 11.4 before 11.4 FP1 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted URL, a different vulnerability than CVE-2014-8898 and CVE-2014-8899.

Name: CVE-2014-8898
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Collaboration Server in IBM InfoSphere Master Data Management Server for Product Information Management 9.x through 9.1 and InfoSphere Master Data Management - Collaborative Edition 10.x through 10.1, 11.0 before FP7, and 11.3 and 11.4 before 11.4 FP1 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted URL, a different vulnerability than CVE-2014-8897 and CVE-2014-8899.

Name: CVE-2014-8899
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Collaboration Server in IBM InfoSphere Master Data Management Server for Product Information Management 9.x through 9.1 and InfoSphere Master Data Management - Collaborative Edition 10.x through 10.1, 11.0 before FP7, and 11.3 and 11.4 before 11.4 FP1 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted URL, a different vulnerability than CVE-2014-8897 and CVE-2014-8898.

Name: CVE-2014-8900
Description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in IBM UrbanCode Release 6.0.1.6 and earlier, 6.1.0.7 and earlier, and 6.1.1.1 and earlier.

Name: CVE-2014-8901
Description: IBM DB2 9.5 through FP10, 9.7 through FP10, 9.8 through FP5, 10.1 through FP4, and 10.5 before FP5 allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via a crafted XML query.

Name: CVE-2014-8902
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Blog Portlet in IBM WebSphere Portal 6.1.0 through 6.1.0.6 CF27, 6.1.5 through 6.1.5.3 CF27, 7.0.0 through 7.0.0.2 CF29, 8.0.0 through 8.0.0.1 CF14, and 8.5.0 before CF04 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted URL.

Name: CVE-2014-8903
Description: IBM Curam Social Program Management 6.0 SP2 before EP26, 6.0.4 before 6.0.4.5iFix10 and 6.0.5 before 6.0.5.6 allows remote authenticated users to load arbitrary Java classes via unspecified vectors.

Name: CVE-2014-8904
Description: lquerylv in cmdlvm in IBM AIX 5.3, 6.1, and 7.1 and VIOS 2.2.x allows local users to gain privileges via a crafted DBGCMD_LQUERYLV environment-variable value.

Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in IBM WebSphere Portal 6.1.0.x through 6.1.0.6 CF27, 6.1.5.x through 6.1.5.3 CF27, 7.0.0.x through 7.0.0.2 CF29, 8.0.0.x before 8.0.0.1 CF15, and 8.5.0 before CF05 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted URL.

Name: CVE-2014-8910
Description: IBM DB2 9.7 through FP10, 9.8 through FP5, 10.1 before FP5, and 10.5 through FP5 on Linux, UNIX, and Windows allows remote authenticated users to read arbitrary text files via a crafted XML/XSLT function in a SELECT statement.

Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in IBM Content Navigator 2.0.0 and 2.0.1 before 2.0.1.2 FP002 IF003 and 2.0.3 before 2.0.3.2 FP002 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the Accept-Language HTTP header.

Name: CVE-2014-8912
Description: IBM WebSphere Portal 6.1.0 through 6.1.0.6 CF27, 6.1.5 through 6.1.5.3 CF27, 7.0.0 through 7.0.0.2 CF29, 8.0.0 through 8.0.0.1 CF18, and 8.5.0 before CF08 improperly restricts resource access, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via unspecified vectors, as demonstrated by configuration information.

Name: CVE-2014-8913
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Process Portal in IBM Business Process Manager 8.0 through 8.0.1.3, 8.5.0 through 8.5.0.1, and 8.5.5 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted URL, a different vulnerability than CVE-2014-8914.

Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Process Portal in IBM Business Process Manager 8.0 through 8.0.1.3, 8.5.0 through 8.5.0.1, and 8.5.5 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted URL, a different vulnerability than CVE-2014-8913.

Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in IBM OpenPages GRC Platform 6.2 before IF7, 6.2.1 before 6.2.1.1 IF5, 7.0 before FP4, and 7.1 before FP1 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted URL, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-0144.

Name: CVE-2014-8917
Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in (1) dojox/form/resources/uploader.swf (aka upload.swf), (2) dojox/form/resources/fileuploader.swf (aka fileupload.swf), (3) dojox/av/resources/audio.swf, and (4) dojox/av/resources/video.swf in the IBM Dojo Toolkit, as used in IBM Social Media Analytics 1.3 before IF11 and other products, allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

Name: CVE-2014-8918
Description: IBM Security AppScan Standard 8.x and 9.x before 9.0.1.1 FP1 does not properly verify X.509 certificates from SSL servers, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof servers and obtain sensitive information via a crafted certificate.

Name: CVE-2014-8919
Description: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem.  When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

Name: CVE-2014-8920
Description: Buffer overflow in the Data Transfer Program in IBM i Access 5770-XE1 5R4, 6.1, and 7.1 on Windows allows local users to gain privileges via unspecified vectors.

Name: CVE-2014-8921
Description: The IBM Notes Traveler Companion application 1.0 and 1.1 before 201411010515 for Window Phone, as distributed in IBM Notes Traveler 9.0.1, does not properly restrict the number of executions of the automatic configuration option, which makes it easier for remote attackers to capture credentials by conducting a phishing attack involving an encrypted e-mail message.

Name: CVE-2014-8922
Description: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem.  When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

Name: CVE-2014-8923
Description: The (1) IBM Tivoli Identity Manager Active Directory adapter before 5.1.24 and (2) IBM Security Identity Manager Active Directory adapter before 6.0.14 for IBM Security Identity Manager on Windows, when certain log and trace levels are configured, store the cleartext administrator password in a log file, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information by reading a file.

Name: CVE-2014-8924
Description: The server in IBM License Metric Tool 7.2.2 before IF15 and 7.5 before IF24 and Tivoli Asset Discovery for Distributed 7.2.2 before IF15 and 7.5 before IF24 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files or send TCP requests to intranet servers via XML data containing an external entity declaration in conjunction with an entity reference, related to an XML External Entity (XXE) issue.

Name: CVE-2014-8925
Description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in ClearQuest Web in IBM Rational ClearQuest 7.1.x before 7.1.2.17, 8.0.0.x before 8.0.0.14, and 8.0.1.x before 8.0.1.7 allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of arbitrary users for requests that trigger a logout or insert XSS sequences.

Name: CVE-2014-8926
Description: Common Inventory Technology (CIT) before 2.7.0.2050 in IBM License Metric Tool 7.2.2, 7.5, and 9; Endpoint Manger for Software Use Analysis 9; and Tivoli Asset Discovery for Distributed 7.2.2 and 7.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption or application crash) via a crafted XML query, a different vulnerability than CVE-2014-8927.

Name: CVE-2014-8927
Description: Common Inventory Technology (CIT) before 2.7.0.2050 in IBM License Metric Tool 7.2.2, 7.5, and 9; Endpoint Manger for Software Use Analysis 9; and Tivoli Asset Discovery for Distributed 7.2.2 and 7.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption or application crash) via a crafted XML query, a different vulnerability than CVE-2014-8926.

Name: CVE-2014-8937
Description: Lexiglot through 2014-11-20 allows denial of service because api/update.php launches svn update operations that use a great deal of resources.

Name: CVE-2014-8938
Description: Lexiglot through 2014-11-20 allows local users to obtain sensitive information by listing a process because the username and password are on the command line.

Name: CVE-2014-8939
Description: Lexiglot through 2014-11-20 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information (full path) via an include/smarty/plugins/modifier.date_format.php request if PHP has a non-recommended configuration that produces warning messages.

Name: CVE-2014-8940
Description: Lexiglot through 2014-11-20 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information (names and details of projects) by visiting the /update.log URI.

Name: CVE-2014-8941
Description: Lexiglot through 2014-11-20 allows SQL injection via an admin.php?page=users&from_id= or admin.php?page=history&limit= URI.

Name: CVE-2014-8942
Description: Lexiglot through 2014-11-20 allows CSRF.

Name: CVE-2014-8943
Description: Lexiglot through 2014-11-20 allows SSRF via the admin.php?page=projects svn_url parameter.

Name: CVE-2014-8944
Description: Lexiglot through 2014-11-20 allows XSS (Reflected) via the username, or XSS (Stored) via the admin.php?page=config install_name, intro_message, or new_file_content parameter.

Name: CVE-2014-8945
Description: admin.php?page=projects in Lexiglot through 2014-11-20 allows command injection via username and password fields.

Name: CVE-2014-8946
Description: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem.  When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

Name: CVE-2014-8947
Description: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem.  When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

Name: CVE-2014-8948
Description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in the iMember360 plugin 3.8.012 through 3.9.001 for WordPress allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators for requests that with an unspecified impact via the i4w_trace parameter.  NOTE: this can be leveraged with CVE-2014-8948 to execute arbitrary commands.
References: EXPLOIT-DB:33076   |   URL:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/33076   |   FULLDISC:20140424 Multiple Vulnerabilities in iMember360 (Wordpress plugin)   |   URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2014/Apr/265   |   MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/126324/WordPress-iMember360is-3.9.001-XSS-Disclosure-Code-Execution.html   |   OSVDB:106301   |   URL:http://osvdb.org/show/osvdb/106301   |   SECUNIA:58094   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/58094

Name: CVE-2014-8949
Description: The iMember360 plugin 3.8.012 through 3.9.001 for WordPress allows remote authenticated administrators to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in the i4w_trace parameter.  NOTE: this can be leveraged with CVE-2014-8948 to allow remote attackers to execute code.  NOTE: it is not clear whether this issue itself crosses privileges.
References: EXPLOIT-DB:33076   |   URL:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/33076   |   FULLDISC:20140424 Multiple Vulnerabilities in iMember360 (Wordpress plugin)   |   URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2014/Apr/265   |   MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/126324/WordPress-iMember360is-3.9.001-XSS-Disclosure-Code-Execution.html   |   OSVDB:106301   |   URL:http://osvdb.org/show/osvdb/106301   |   SECUNIA:58094   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/58094

Name: CVE-2014-8950
Description: Unspecified vulnerability in Check Point Security Gateway R77 and R77.10, when the (1) URL Filtering or (2) Identity Awareness blade is used, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via vectors involving an HTTPS request.

Name: CVE-2014-8951
Description: Unspecified vulnerability in Check Point Security Gateway R75, R76, R77, and R77.10, when UserCheck is enabled and the (1) Application Control, (2) URL Filtering, (3) DLP, (4) Threat Emulation, (5) Anti-Bot, or (6) Anti-Virus blade is used, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (fwk0 process crash, core dump, and restart) via a redirect to the UserCheck page.

Name: CVE-2014-8952
Description: Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in Check Point Security Gateway R75.40VS, R75.45, R75.46, R75.47, R76, R77, and R77.10, when the (1) IPS blade, (2) IPsec Remote Access, (3) Mobile Access / SSL VPN blade, (4) SSL Network Extender, (5) Identify Awareness blade, (6) HTTPS Inspection, (7) UserCheck, or (8) Data Leak Prevention blade module is enabled, allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service ("stability issue") via an unspecified "traffic condition."

Name: CVE-2014-8953
Description: Multiple cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in Php Scriptlerim Who's Who script allow remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators or requests that (1) add an admin account via a request to filepath/yonetim/plugin/adminsave.php or have unspecified impact via a request to (2) ayarsave.php, (3) uyesave.php, (4) slaytadd.php, or (5) slaytsave.php.

Name: CVE-2014-8954
Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in phpSound 1.0.5 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) Title or (2) Description fields in a playlist or the (3) filter parameter in an explore action to index.php.

Name: CVE-2014-8955
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Contact Form Clean and Simple (clean-and-simple-contact-form-by-meg-nicholas) plugin 4.4.0 and earlier for WordPress allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the cscf[name] parameter to contact-us/.

Name: CVE-2014-8956
Description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the K7Sentry.sys kernel mode driver (aka K7AV Sentry Device Driver) before 12.8.0.119, as used in multiple K7 Computing products, allows local users to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges via unspecified vectors.
References: FULLDISC:20141210 CVE-2014-8956 - Privilege Escalation In K7 Computing Multiple Products [K7Sentry.sys]   |   URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2014/Dec/46   |   MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/129472/K7-Computing-Multiple-Products-K7Sentry.sys-Out-Of-Bounds-Write.html   |   MISC:https://www.portcullis-security.com/security-research-and-downloads/security-advisories/cve-2014-8956/

Name: CVE-2014-8957
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in OpenKM before 6.4.19 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the Tasks parameter.

Name: CVE-2014-8958
Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in phpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.6, 4.1.x before 4.1.14.7, and 4.2.x before 4.2.12 allow remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted (1) database, (2) table, or (3) column name that is improperly handled during rendering of the table browse page; a crafted ENUM value that is improperly handled during rendering of the (4) table print view or (5) zoom search page; or (6) a crafted pma_fontsize cookie that is improperly handled during rendering of the home page.

Name: CVE-2014-8959
Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in libraries/gis/GIS_Factory.class.php in the GIS editor in phpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.6, 4.1.x before 4.1.14.7, and 4.2.x before 4.2.12 allows remote authenticated users to include and execute arbitrary local files via a crafted geometry-type parameter.

Name: CVE-2014-8960
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in libraries/error_report.lib.php in the error-reporting feature in phpMyAdmin 4.1.x before 4.1.14.7 and 4.2.x before 4.2.12 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted filename.

Name: CVE-2014-8961
Description: Directory traversal vulnerability in libraries/error_report.lib.php in the error-reporting feature in phpMyAdmin 4.1.x before 4.1.14.7 and 4.2.x before 4.2.12 allows remote authenticated users to obtain potentially sensitive information about a file's line count via a crafted parameter.

Name: CVE-2014-8962
Description: Stack-based buffer overflow in stream_decoder.c in libFLAC before 1.3.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted .flac file.
References: BID:71280   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/71280   |   BUGTRAQ:20141125 [oCERT 2014-008] libFLAC multiple issues   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/534083/100/0/threaded   |   CONFIRM:http://advisories.mageia.org/MGASA-2014-0499.html   |   CONFIRM:http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/bulletinjan2015-2370101.html   |   CONFIRM:https://git.xiph.org/?p=flac.git;a=commit;h=5b3033a2b355068c11fe637e14ac742d273f076e   |   DEBIAN:DSA-3082   |   URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2014/dsa-3082   |   MANDRIVA:MDVSA-2014:239   |   URL:http://www.mandriva.com/security/advisories?name=MDVSA-2014:239   |   MANDRIVA:MDVSA-2015:188   |   URL:http://www.mandriva.com/security/advisories?name=MDVSA-2015:188   |   MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/129261/libFLAC-1.3.0-Stack-Overflow-Heap-Overflow-Code-Execution.html   |   MISC:http://www.ocert.org/advisories/ocert-2014-008.html   |   REDHAT:RHSA-2015:0767   |   URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2015-0767.html   |   SUSE:openSUSE-SU-2014:1588   |   URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-updates/2014-12/msg00034.html   |   UBUNTU:USN-2426-1   |   URL:http://www.ubuntu.com/usn/USN-2426-1

Description: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem.  When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

Name: CVE-2014-8964
Description: Heap-based buffer overflow in PCRE 8.36 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or have other unspecified impact via a crafted regular expression, related to an assertion that allows zero repeats.
References: BID:71206   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/71206   |   CONFIRM:http://advisories.mageia.org/MGASA-2014-0534.html   |   CONFIRM:http://bugs.exim.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1546   |   CONFIRM:http://www.exim.org/viewvc/pcre?view=revision&revision=1513   |   CONFIRM:http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/bulletinjul2015-2511963.html   |   CONFIRM:https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1166147   |   FEDORA:FEDORA-2014-15573   |   URL:http://lists.fedoraproject.org/pipermail/package-announce/2014-December/145843.html   |   FEDORA:FEDORA-2014-17624   |   URL:http://lists.fedoraproject.org/pipermail/package-announce/2015-January/147474.html   |   FEDORA:FEDORA-2014-17626   |   URL:http://lists.fedoraproject.org/pipermail/package-announce/2015-January/147516.html   |   FEDORA:FEDORA-2014-17642   |   URL:http://lists.fedoraproject.org/pipermail/package-announce/2015-January/147511.html   |   GENTOO:GLSA-201607-02   |   URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201607-02   |   MANDRIVA:MDVSA-2015:002   |   URL:http://www.mandriva.com/security/advisories?name=MDVSA-2015:002   |   MANDRIVA:MDVSA-2015:137   |   URL:http://www.mandriva.com/security/advisories?name=MDVSA-2015:137   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141121 Re: CVE request: heap buffer overflow in PCRE   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/11/21/6   |   REDHAT:RHSA-2015:0330   |   URL:http://rhn.redhat.com/errata/RHSA-2015-0330.html   |   SUSE:openSUSE-SU-2015:0858   |   URL:http://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-updates/2015-05/msg00014.html

Description: Microsoft Internet Explorer 6 through 8 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted web site, aka "Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability."

Description: Use-after-free vulnerability in Microsoft Internet Explorer allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted HTML document in conjunction with a Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) token sequence specifying the run-in value for the display property, leading to improper CElement reference counting.

Name: CVE-2014-8985
Description: Microsoft Internet Explorer 11 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted web site, aka "Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability," a different vulnerability than CVE-2014-2810, CVE-2014-2811, CVE-2014-2822, CVE-2014-2823, CVE-2014-4057, and CVE-2014-4145.

Name: CVE-2014-8986
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the selection list in the filters in the Configuration Report page (adm_config_report.php) in MantisBT 1.2.13 through 1.2.17 allows remote administrators to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted config option, a different vulnerability than CVE-2014-8987.
References: CONFIRM:https://github.com/mantisbt/mantisbt/commit/cabacdc291c251bfde0dc2a2c945c02cef41bf40   |   DEBIAN:DSA-3120   |   URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2015/dsa-3120   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141115 RE: CVE Request: XSS vulnerability in MantisBT 1.2.13   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/11/15/1   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141115 RE: CVE Request: XSS vulnerability in MantisBT 1.2.13   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/11/15/2   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141115 Re: Re: CVE Request: XSS vulnerability in MantisBT 1.2.13   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/11/15/3   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141119 RE: CVE Request: XSS vulnerability in MantisBT 1.2.13   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/11/19/20   |   SECUNIA:62101   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/62101

Name: CVE-2014-8987
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the "set configuration" box in the Configuration Report page (adm_config_report.php) in MantisBT 1.2.13 through 1.2.17 allows remote administrators to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the config_option parameter, a different vulnerability than CVE-2014-8986.
References: CONFIRM:http://www.mantisbt.org/bugs/view.php?id=17870   |   CONFIRM:https://github.com/mantisbt/mantisbt/commit/49c3d089   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141114 CVE Request: XSS vulnerability in MantisBT 1.2.13   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/11/14/9   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141115 RE: CVE Request: XSS vulnerability in MantisBT 1.2.13   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/11/15/2   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141115 Re: CVE Request: XSS vulnerability in MantisBT 1.2.13   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/11/15/4   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141115 Re: Re: CVE Request: XSS vulnerability in MantisBT 1.2.13   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/11/15/3   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141119 RE: CVE Request: XSS vulnerability in MantisBT 1.2.13   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/11/19/21

Name: CVE-2014-8988
Description: MantisBT before 1.2.18 allows remote authenticated users to bypass the $g_download_attachments_threshold and $g_view_attachments_threshold restrictions and read attachments for private projects by leveraging access to a project that does not restrict access to attachments and a request to the download URL.
References: BID:71104   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/71104   |   CONFIRM:http://www.mantisbt.org/bugs/view.php?id=17742   |   CONFIRM:https://github.com/mantisbt/mantisbt/commit/5f0b150b   |   DEBIAN:DSA-3120   |   URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2015/dsa-3120   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141115 CVE Request: information disclosure in MantisBT attachments   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/11/15/6   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141119 Re: CVE Request: information disclosure in MantisBT attachments   |   URL:http://seclists.org/oss-sec/2014/q4/693   |   SECUNIA:62101   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/62101   |   XF:mantisbt-fileapi-sec-bypass(98731)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/98731

Name: CVE-2014-8989
Description: The Linux kernel through 3.17.4 does not properly restrict dropping of supplemental group memberships in certain namespace scenarios, which allows local users to bypass intended file permissions by leveraging a POSIX ACL containing an entry for the group category that is more restrictive than the entry for the other category, aka a "negative groups" issue, related to kernel/groups.c, kernel/uid16.c, and kernel/user_namespace.c.
References: BID:71154   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/71154   |   CONFIRM:http://thread.gmane.org/gmane.linux.man/7385/   |   FEDORA:FEDORA-2015-0515   |   URL:http://lists.fedoraproject.org/pipermail/package-announce/2015-January/147973.html   |   FEDORA:FEDORA-2015-0517   |   URL:http://lists.fedoraproject.org/pipermail/package-announce/2015-January/147864.html   |   MANDRIVA:MDVSA-2015:058   |   URL:http://www.mandriva.com/security/advisories?name=MDVSA-2015:058   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141120 Re: Linux user namespaces can bypass group-based restrictions - Linux kernel   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/11/20/4   |   UBUNTU:USN-2515-1   |   URL:http://www.ubuntu.com/usn/USN-2515-1   |   UBUNTU:USN-2516-1   |   URL:http://www.ubuntu.com/usn/USN-2516-1   |   UBUNTU:USN-2517-1   |   URL:http://www.ubuntu.com/usn/USN-2517-1   |   UBUNTU:USN-2518-1   |   URL:http://www.ubuntu.com/usn/USN-2518-1

Name: CVE-2014-8990
Description: default-rsyncssh.lua in Lsyncd 2.1.5 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in a filename.
References: BID:71179   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/71179   |   CONFIRM:https://github.com/axkibe/lsyncd/commit/18f02ad013b41a72753912155ae2ba72f2a53e52   |   CONFIRM:https://github.com/axkibe/lsyncd/commit/e6016b3748370878778b8f0b568d5281cc248aa4   |   CONFIRM:https://github.com/axkibe/lsyncd/issues/220   |   DEBIAN:DSA-3130   |   URL:http://www.debian.org/security/2015/dsa-3130   |   FEDORA:FEDORA-2014-15373   |   URL:http://lists.fedoraproject.org/pipermail/package-announce/2014-December/145131.html   |   FEDORA:FEDORA-2014-15393   |   URL:http://lists.fedoraproject.org/pipermail/package-announce/2014-December/145114.html   |   GENTOO:GLSA-201702-05   |   URL:https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201702-05   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141119 CVE request: lsyncd command injection   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/11/19/1   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141120 Re: CVE request: lsyncd command injection   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/11/20/5   |   SECUNIA:62321   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/62321

Name: CVE-2014-8991
Description: pip 1.3 through 1.5.6 allows local users to cause a denial of service (prevention of package installation) by creating a /tmp/pip-build-* file for another user.
References: BID:71209   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/71209   |   CONFIRM:http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/topics/security/bulletinjul2015-2511963.html   |   CONFIRM:https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=725847   |   CONFIRM:https://github.com/pypa/pip/pull/2122   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141117 Requesting a CVE for pip - Local DoS with predictable temp directory names   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/11/19/17   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141120 Re: Requesting a CVE for pip - Local DoS with predictable temp directory names   |   URL:http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2014/11/20/6

Name: CVE-2014-8992
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in manager/assets/fileapi/FileAPI.flash.image.swf in MODX Revolution 2.3.2-pl allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the callback parameter.

Name: CVE-2014-8993
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the backend in Open-Xchange (OX) AppSuite before 7.4.2-rev40, 7.6.0 before 7.6.0-rev32, and 7.6.1 before 7.6.1-rev11 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted XHTML file with the application/xhtml+xml MIME type.
References: BUGTRAQ:20150105 Open-Xchange Security Advisory 2015-01-05   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/534383/100/0/threaded   |   MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/129811/Open-Xchange-Server-6-OX-AppSuite-7.6.1-Cross-Site-Scripting.html   |   SECTRACK:1031488   |   URL:http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1031488   |   SECUNIA:62031   |   URL:http://secunia.com/advisories/62031

Name: CVE-2014-8994
Description: The check_diskio plugin 3.2.6 and earlier for Nagios and Icinga allows local users to write to arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a temporary file with a predictable name (tmp/check_diskio_status-*-*).
References: BID:71208   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/71208   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141119 CVE request for check_diskio nagios/icinga plugin   |   URL:http://seclists.org/oss-sec/2014/q4/679   |   MLIST:[oss-security] 20141120 Re: CVE request for check_diskio nagios/icinga plugin   |   URL:http://seclists.org/oss-sec/2014/q4/701   |   XF:checkdiskio-cve20148994-symlink(98849)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/98849

Name: CVE-2014-8995
Description: SQL injection vulnerability in Maarch LetterBox 2.8 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the UserId cookie.

Name: CVE-2014-8996
Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Nibbleblog before 4.0.2 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) author_name or (2) content parameter to index.php.
References: BID:71111   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/71111   |   CONFIRM:http://blog.nibbleblog.com/post/nibbleblog-v4.0.2-coffee/   |   FULLDISC:20141117 Reflected XSS in Nibbleblog <= v4.0.1   |   URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2014/Nov/38   |   MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/129133/Nibbleblog-4.0.1-Cross-Site-Scripting.html   |   XF:nibbleblog-index-xss(98738)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/98738

Name: CVE-2014-8997
Description: Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in the Photo functionality in DigitalVidhya Digi Online Examination System 2.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by uploading a file with an executable extension, then accessing it via a direct request to the file in assets/uploads/images/.

Name: CVE-2014-8998
Description: lib/message.php in X7 Chat 2.0.0 through 2.0.5.1 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary PHP code via a crafted HTTP header to index.php, which is processed by the preg_replace function with the eval switch.

Name: CVE-2014-8999
Description: SQL injection vulnerability in htdocs/modules/system/admin.php in XOOPS before 2.5.7 Final allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the selgroups parameter.
References: BID:71117   |   URL:http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/71117   |   CONFIRM:http://xoops.org/modules/news/article.php?storyid=6658   |   FULLDISC:20141117 XOOPS <= 2.5.6 - Blind SQL Injection   |   URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2014/Nov/39   |   MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/129134/XOOPS-2.5.6-SQL-Injection.html

Name: CVE-2014-9000
Description: Mule Enterprise Management Console (MMC) does not properly restrict access to handler/securityService.rpc, which allows remote authenticated users to gain administrator privileges and execute arbitrary code via a crafted request that adds a new user.  NOTE: this issue was originally reported for ESB Runtime 3.5.1, but it originates in MMC.
References: CONFIRM:http://www.mulesoft.org/documentation/display/current/Mule+Enterprise+Management+Console+Security+Update   |   FULLDISC:20141022 Mulesoft ESB Authenticated Privilege Escalation   |   URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2014/Oct/98   |   FULLDISC:20141024 Re: Mulesoft ESB Authenticated Privilege Escalation   |   URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2014/Oct/107   |   MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/128799

Name: CVE-2014-9001
Description: reminders/index.php in Incredible PBX 11 2.0.6.5.0 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in the (1) APPTMIN, (2) APPTHR, (3) APPTDA, (4) APPTMO, (5) APPTYR, or (6) APPTPHONE parameters.
References: FULLDISC:20141022 Incredible PBX remote command execution exploit   |   URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2014/Oct/101

Name: CVE-2014-9002
Description: Lantronix xPrintServer does not properly restrict access to ips/, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary commands via the c parameter in an rpc action.
References: FULLDISC:20141112 Lantronix xPrintServer Code execution and CSRF vulnerability   |   URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2014/Nov/24   |   MISC:http://i.imgur.com/gjbZhXZ.png   |   MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/129091/Lantronix-xPrintServer-Remote-Command-Execution-CSRF.html   |   XF:xprintserver-version-command-exec(98644)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/98644

Name: CVE-2014-9003
Description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Lantronix xPrintServer allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators for requests that modify configuration, as demonstrated by executing arbitrary commands using the c parameter in the rpc action.
References: FULLDISC:20141112 Lantronix xPrintServer Code execution and CSRF vulnerability   |   URL:http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2014/Nov/24   |   MISC:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/129091/Lantronix-xPrintServer-Remote-Command-Execution-CSRF.html   |   XF:xprintserver-version-csrf(98645)   |   URL:https://exchange.xforce.ibmcloud.com/vulnerabilities/98645

Name: CVE-2014-9004
Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in vldPersonals before 2.7.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the id parameter in a member_profile action to index.php.

Name: CVE-2014-9005
Description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in vldPersonals before 2.7.1 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) country, (2) gender1, or ((3) gender2 parameter in a search action to index.php.
